tr.td:
Varunkumar Nagarajan, the author of this blog, is a Software Engineer currently employed with D.E.Shaw & Co., Hyderabad. Varun completed his Five Years Integrated M.Sc (Software Engineering) programme from P.S.G. College of Technology, Coimbatore. He has worked for Intel Technology India Pvt. Ltd. and Interchain Solutions as an intern. A programmer by choice. He loves programming and started blogging on Aug-2006. From then, he became socially active on internet.
Other than programming, Varun is very much passionate about cricket. A die-hard fan of Rahul Dravid. His hobbies include creating flash animations, developing games, etc.
Contact Varun

center.script: function changeImage() { var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*2) + 1; var imgId=11; if (randomnumber< 10) imgId = "0" + randomnumber; else imgId = randomnumber; document.getElementById('imgWishes').src="http://varun-scratchpad.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/holi-" + imgId + ".jpg";setTimeout("changeImage()",1000 * 20);} //changeImage();

div.script: function s(d,e,b,g){if(d>e){e=(d-e)/Math.log(g);d=d-Math.floor(Math.log(b)*e)}else{e=(e-d)/Math.log(g);d=Math.floor(Math.log(b)*e+d)}return d}var c=[],labelCount=[],ts={};var theName = "";ts[theName] = ;for(var t in ts)labelCount[ts[t]]||(labelCount[ts[t]]=new Array(ts[t]));var ta=cloudMin-1;tz=labelCount.length-cloudMin;lc2=document.getElementById("labelCloud");ul=document.createElement("ul");ul.className="label-cloud";for(t in ts)if(!(ts[t]<cloudMin)){for(var i=0;3>i;i++)c[i]=s(minColor[i],maxColor[i],ts[t]-ta,tz);var fs=s(minFontSize,maxFontSize,ts[t]-ta,tz);li=document.createElement("li");li.style.fontSize=fs+"px";li.style.lineHeight="1";a=document.createElement("a");a.title=ts[t]>1?ts[t]+" posts on "+t:ts[t]+" post on "+t;a.href="/search/label/"+encodeURIComponent(t);if(lcShowCount){span=document.createElement("span");span.innerHTML="("+ts[t]+") ";span.className="label-count";a.appendChild(document.createTextNode(t));li.appendChild(a);li.appendChild(span)}else{a.appendChild(document.createTextNode(t));li.appendChild(a)}ul.appendChild(li);abnk=document.createTextNode(" ");ul.appendChild(abnk)}lc2.appendChild(ul);
